full_summary:
Tender Notice
================

**Title:** Lab Coat Rental

**Contract Number:** 1000254864

**Amendment Number:** 7

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Category:** Services

**Publication Date:** 07 February 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** 25 March 2024, 14:00 (EST)

**Region of Opportunity:** Quebec (except National Capital Region)

**Region of Delivery:** Canada

**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement.

**Procurement Details**

The Department of Health Canada invites proposals for the rental, maintenance, and repair of lab coats, towels, hand towels, and dishcloths. The successful provider will be responsible for providing high-quality lab coats and related items to Health Canada.

**Submission Requirements**

Proposals must be submitted electronically via the Canada Buys website at [www.canadabuys.ca](http://www.canadabuys.ca). The proposal must be accompanied by:

1. A completed Request for Proposal (RFP) form
2. A price list, in Excel format
3. A detailed breakdown of the costs associated with the rental, maintenance, and repair of lab coats and related items
4. Answers to questions posed in the RFP

**Evaluation Criteria**

The proposals will be evaluated based on lowest price.

**Contact Information**

For any questions or inquiries related to this solicitation, please contact René Beauchamp at (613) 716-5315, or via email at [Rene.Beaucahmp@hc-sc.gc.ca](mailto:Rene.Beaucahmp@hc-sc.gc.ca).

**Attachments**

The following attachments are available for download:

1. Request for Proposal (RFP) form (xlsx)
2. Price list (xlsx)
3. Questions and Answers (xlsx)
4. Notification of Procurement and Processing (xlsx)
5. Appendix 1 - Price list
6. Appendix 2 - Questions and Answers
7. etc.

Please note that this notice is an expired tender notice.
